articles.author: David Flynn
articles.title: Sydney Airport limits arrivals at 50 people per flight, 450 per day - Executive Traveller
articles.description: An overflow of travellers on flights originally bound for Melbourne is straining Sydney's quarantine facilities.
articles.content: Sydney Airport has introduced a strict limit on the number of passengers arriving on international flights, as the NSW government fears a blowout in the costs of mandatory 14-day hotel isolation afte… [+2504 chars]
